argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | brab2a.1 | |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) |
| 2 |  | brab2a.2 | |- R = { <. x , y >. | ( ( x e. C /\ y e. D ) /\ ph ) } |
| 3 |  | #P_opabssxp | |- { <. x , y >. | ( ( x e. C /\ y e. D ) /\ ph ) } C_ ( C X. D ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_eqsstri | |- R C_ ( C X. D ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_brel | |- ( A R B -> ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_df-br | |- ( A R B <-> <. A , B >. e. R ) |
| 7 | 2 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( <. A , B >. e. R <-> <. A , B >. e. { <. x , y >. | ( ( x e. C /\ y e. D ) /\ ph ) } ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_bitri | |- ( A R B <-> <. A , B >. e. { <. x , y >. | ( ( x e. C /\ y e. D ) /\ ph ) } ) |
| 9 | 1 | #P_opelopab2a | |- ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) -> ( <. A , B >. e. { <. x , y >. | ( ( x e. C /\ y e. D ) /\ ph ) } <-> ps ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl5bb | |- ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) -> ( A R B <-> ps ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 10 | #P_biadan2 | |- ( A R B <-> ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) /\ ps ) ) |
\
 The law of concretion for a binary relation.  See ~ brab2a for alternate proof.  TODO: should one of them be deleted?  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
